alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Southeastern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 12 at 1:55AM PDT until April 12 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Northern Elko County and Southeastern Elko County. * WHEN...Until 5 PM PDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. A few power outages are possible. Dangerous cross winds possible, especially on north to south roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds could lead to blowing and drifting snow, especially on higher passes and summits, leading to hazardous travel conditions.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; Southeastern Elko County
